titles.title: Original Open for Business Act of 2023
Original Open for Business Act of 2023
To mandate certain hours for in-person branch offices of depository institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Original Open for Business Act of 2023
This bill requires each branch location of a depository institution with in-person customer service to remain open until 7:00 p.m. on weekdays and for a minimum of four hours on Saturdays.
